list.title: module:compress-images
list.description:
Image Compression Utility

This script compresses images in the /images folder that are larger than 1MB. Original images are preserved in /images/original/ directory. The compression maintains original dimensions while reducing file size.

list.title: module:compress-images~compressImage
list.description: Compresses an image if it's larger than the maximum size

list.title: module:compress-images~ensureDirectoriesExist
list.description: Ensures that the required directories exist, creating them if necessary

list.title: module:compress-images~getFileSizeMB
list.description: Gets the file size in megabytes

list.title: module:compress-images~isImage
list.description: Checks if a file is an image based on its extension

list.title: module:compress-images~processImages
list.description: Processes all images in the directory, compressing those that are larger than the maximum size

list.title: module:config
list.description:
Web Photo Screensaver Configuration

This file contains all configurable options for the Web Photo Screensaver application. Modify these settings to customize the behavior of the application.

list.title: module:config
list.description: Export the configuration object

list.title: module:config~config
list.description: Configuration object containing all application settings

list.title: module:config~config.display
list.description: Display Settings

list.title: module:config~config.images
list.description: Image Settings

list.title: module:config~config.placeholders
list.description: Placeholder Images

list.title: module:config~config.ui
list.description: UI Settings

list.title: module:download-sample-images
list.description:
Download Sample Images Script

This script downloads sample large images for testing the compression utility. It fetches high-quality images from Unsplash and saves them to the public/images directory.

list.title: module:download-sample-images~IMAGES_DIR
list.description: Configuration constants

list.title: module:download-sample-images~SAMPLE_IMAGES
list.description: Sample images to download

list.title: module:download-sample-images~downloadAllImages
list.description: Downloads all sample images defined in the SAMPLE_IMAGES array

list.title: module:download-sample-images~downloadImage
list.description: Downloads a single image from a URL and saves it to the images directory

list.title: module:download-sample-images~ensureDirectoryExists
list.description: Ensures that the images directory exists, creating it if necessary

list.title: module:main
list.description:
Web Photo Screensaver Application

A browser-based photo screensaver that displays images in fullscreen mode with smooth transitions. Supports custom images, configurable display duration, and keyboard navigation. Features include image selection, randomization, background color customization, and more.

list.title: module:main~applyConfigToDOM
list.description: Applies configuration values to the DOM

list.title: module:main~compressImageIfNeeded
list.description: Compresses an image if it's larger than the specified size This function is kept for reference but is not currently used. Image compression is now handled by the server-side script.

list.title: module:main~createThumbnail
list.description: Creates a thumbnail element for an image

list.title: module:main~currentImageIndex
list.description: Current index in the image array being displayed

list.title: module:main~currentOrderIndex
list.description: Current index in the display order array

list.title: module:main~displayDuration
list.description: Default duration in milliseconds between image transitions

list.title: module:main~displayImage
list.description: Displays an image at the specified index

list.title: module:main~displayOrder
list.description: Array to hold the order of images to display

list.title: module:main~exitFullscreen
list.description: Exits fullscreen mode

list.title: module:main~folderImages
list.description: Array to hold images from the images folder

list.title: module:main~generateDisplayOrder
list.description: Generates the display order for images based on randomization setting

list.title: module:main~getCurrentImageList
list.description: Gets the current list of images to display

list.title: module:main~getImageName
list.description: Gets the name for an image at the specified index

list.title: module:main~getImageUrl
list.description: Gets the URL for an image at the specified index

list.title: module:main~handleFullscreenChange
list.description: Handles fullscreen change events

list.title: module:main~hideLoadingOverlay
list.description: Hides the loading overlay and shows the main content

list.title: module:main~hideMenu
list.description: Hides the corner menu with a slight delay

list.title: module:main~initializeApp
list.description: Initializes the application

list.title: module:main~loadImagesFromFolder
list.description: Loads images from the images folder and creates thumbnails First tries to load from the local images directory, then falls back to sample images

list.title: module:main~loadingOverlay
list.description: Loading Overlay Management Handles the loading overlay to prevent Flash of Unstyled Content (FOUC)

list.title: module:main~menuTimeout
list.description: Timeout ID for hiding the menu

list.title: module:main~nextImage
list.description: Advances to the next image in the slideshow

list.title: module:main~preloadImages
list.description: Preloads images for smoother transitions

list.title: module:main~preloadedImages
list.description: Cache for preloaded images

list.title: module:main~previousImage
list.description: Goes to the previous image in the slideshow

list.title: module:main~randomizeOrder
list.description: Flag to track if images should be displayed in random order

list.title: module:main~requestFullscreen
list.description: Requests fullscreen mode for the container

list.title: module:main~resetSlideshowTimer
list.description: Resets the slideshow timer with a delay to prevent double transitions

list.title: module:main~selectedImages
list.description: Array to hold selected images for the slideshow

list.title: module:main~showMenu
list.description: Shows the corner menu

list.title: module:main~showMessage
list.description: Displays a temporary message to the user

list.title: module:main~slideshowInterval
list.description: Interval ID for the slideshow

list.title: module:main~startSlideshow
list.description: Starts the slideshow with the current display duration

list.title: module:main~stopSlideshow
list.description: Stops the slideshow by clearing the interval

list.title: module:main~thumbnailContainer
list.description: DOM Elements Collection of DOM element references

list.title: module:main~updateSelectedImages
list.description: Updates the selectedImages array based on the selected state of folderImages

list.title: module:main~updateStartButtonText
list.description: Updates the start button text with the current number of selected images
